segments.text: I'm glad you're on your ten-year reunion planning committee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you get the TV to yourself while I spend my nights surfing the Net for missing classmates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not why . This way I can see how you guys do this sort of thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess . Don't you have reunions in Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . Every year . But just for our forty-person class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ours are for everyone that graduated in the same year .
segments.speaker: S2
